nodes.bodyText: Didn't V2 final get rid of /api?
Version same as the one mentioned in root pom
Without understanding the whole flow and realizing it may be beyond the scope of this PR, do we still need to use Joda? According to their own website, you only need to be using pre-Java 8.

This is part of swagger-api/swagger-codegen#9893  (i.e. all templates need to be included, not just the ones we're using/overriding)
I don't think we've selected Joda time generation, but I could be wrong.
